revised_title: Studies of the Middle Atmosphere: A Tribute to Sir Harrie Massey
tldr: This article discusses the history and contributions of Sir Harrie Massey to the field of atmospheric science. It highlights his research, writings, and influence on events and developments in the field over thirty years. Massey's dedication to advancing atmospheric science and his leadership in various committees and organizations are also emphasized.
